Summary: We saw a hellicoppter searching a mountain top with a search light. The UFO ascended out of the mountain and the hillecopter chased it but the object accelerated too quickly.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ventura
There were no other sightings in Ventura on or around October 27th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy roommate and I noticed a helicopter searching a mountain near our house with a searchlight. After wondering what it was looking for for aprox 20 minutes. We noticed an orange orb ejecting and ascending out of the mountain where the helicopter was looking. The helicopter gave chase to it but the orb was way to fast and it flew west over the ocean and the helicopter immediately gave up its search and turned around.
